markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Soothing Words](/Spells.aspx?ID=1800)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 374 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You attempt to calm the target by uttering soothing words in a calm and even tone. The target gains a +1 status bonus to Will saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects.

 In addition, when you Cast this Spell, you can attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) one emotion effect on the target.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The bonus to saves increases to +2, or +3 against emotion effects.
name: Soothing Words
